system.description:
Effect: All allies on the Field are cured of their Major Status Conditions.
The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.
Requirement: User is a Dynamaxed Appletun and has a Grass-Type attack on their Active List.
